content:
I had a quick question on L2s, was wondering if this is the right place to ask. If not, lmk where to ask!

If an optimistic L2 has a centralized sequencer and does not have permissionless fraud proofs, can they force invalid transactions and STFs? It's my understanding that they could as full nodes can see the malicious behavior but not prevent it, especially since the L1 bridge contract makes it infeasible for the full nodes to fork the L2
